definition: a person who looks after babies (usually in the person's own home) while the babys' parents are working
details:
noun
- a person who looks after babies (usually in the person's own home) while the babys' parents are working
= synonyms: babyminder
- someone (usually in totalitarian countries) who is assigned to watch over foreign visitors
= example: someone (usually in totalitarian countries) who is assigned to watch over foreign visitors
